sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import './styles.css' import border from '../img/border.png' import products from '../productslist' function ShoppingCartPage(props) { function removeItem(e, {cart, setFinalCart, cartNum, setFinalCartNum}) { for (let i = 0; i < products.length; i++) { if (e.target.name === products[i].name) { cart = cart.filter(function(e) { return e !== products[i].name }) setFinalCart(cart) cartNum = cart.filter(function(e) { return e !== cartNum[i] }) setFinalCartNum(cartNum) } } window.location.reload() } function makeItems() { if (cart != []) { cart.map((indiv) => { return <>
  • {indiv.name}
    {indiv.description}
    {cartNum}
    {indiv.price}
    Adding to:
    {(indiv.price) / (cartNum)}
    • }) } } return <>
      {makeItems()}
    } export default ShoppingCartPage
